00018 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, NIDAQAODOPulser, "NMR pulser NI-DAQ analog/digital output");
00019 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, NIDAQDOPulser, "NMR pulser NI-DAQ digital output only");
00020 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, NIDAQMSeriesWithSSeriesPulser, "NMR pulser NI-DAQ M Series with S Series");
00021 
00022 XNIDAQMSeriesWithSSeriesPulser::XNIDAQMSeriesWithSSeriesPulser(const char *name, bool runtime,
00023                                                                const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00024                                                                const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00025                                                                const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00026                                                                const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00027     XNIDAQmxPulser(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00028     m_ao_interface(XNode::create<XNIDAQmxInterface>("SubInterface", false,
00029                                                     dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(this->shared_from_this())))
00030 {
00031     interfaces->insert(m_ao_interface);
00032     m_ao_interface->control()->setUIEnabled(false);
00033 }
00034 void
00035 XNIDAQAODOPulser::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00036 {
00037     openAODO();
00038     this->start();  
00039 }
00040 void
00041 XNIDAQDOPulser::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00042 {
00043 //  if(XString(interface()->productSeries()) != "M")
00044 //      throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(i18n("Product-type mismatch."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00045     openDO();
00046     this->start();  
00047 }
00048 void
00049 XNIDAQMSeriesWithSSeriesPulser::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00050 {
00051     if(XString(interface()->productSeries()) != "M")
00052         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(i18n("Product-type mismatch."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00053 
00054     intfAO()->start();
00055     if(!intfAO()->isOpened())
00056         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(i18n("Opening M series device failed."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00057 
00058     if(XString(intfAO()->productSeries()) != "S")
00059         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(i18n("Product-type mismatch."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00060     openAODO();
00061     this->start();  
00062 }
